sentences.english: Mass armies (in most societies) have been replaced by highly trained professional-technical military forces.

sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.

sentences.english: Therefore, the dissertation concentrates on the research of localization in WSNs.

sentences.english: Safety measures co-evolve with the development of the technology.

sentences.english: The Rapid Displacement Heating (RDH) cooking process has been developed by Beloit Corporation as an energy efficient pulping system.

sentences.english: They have retrained a number of young technicians for our factory.
sentences.chinese: 他们为我厂再培训了一些年轻的技术员。

sentences.english: The sophisticated system destroys enemy warheads through direct "hit-to-kill" technology. "It's like hitting a bullet with a bullet," Watkins says.

sentences.english: In this paper , the structure of macromaterialogy is discussed and the branching of technological sciences is considered.

sentences.english: An automatic software-development technique of interactive interface for intelligent instruments is presented in this paper.
